languages.text: "Вот, можешь забрать эту непослушную тварь. Мне она не подчиняется, так что ей судьба или стать мясом для арены, или выиграть тебе удар-другой по Комиссару".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Это крепкий, но бесполезный кусок железа: никого не признает. Сможешь заставить его служить — бери. Мои разберут его на запчасти, так что не мешкай. Пока он цел".

languages.text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."
languages.original_text: "Вот, можешь забрать эту непослушную тварь. Мне она не подчиняется, так что ей судьба или стать мясом для арены, или выиграть тебе удар-другой по Комиссару".

traits.locale_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient beast. It will not do what I say, so it is bound to become meat for the arena or at least buy you time for striking an extra blow against the Comissar."
"Here, you can have this disobedient beast. It will not do what I say, so it is bound to become meat for the arena or at least buy you time for striking an extra blow against the Comissar."
"Here, you can have this disobedient beast. It refuses to do what I say, so it is bound to become meat for the arena, or at least buy you time to strike an extra blow against the Comissar."
"Here, you can have this disobedient beast. It refuses to do what I say, so it is bound to become meat for the arena, or at least buy you time to strike an extra blow against the Comissar."
"Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."
"Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

languages.text: "Hier, Ihr könnt dieses ungehorsame Ding haben. Es weigert sich, zu tun, was ich sage, also wird es entweder Futter für die Arena oder Ihr könnt dem Kommissar einen zusätzlichen Schlag versetzen."
languages.original_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

traits.locale_text: "Hier, Ihr könnt dieses ungehorsame Ding haben. Es weigert sich, zu tun, was ich sage, also wird es entweder Futter für die Arena oder Ihr könnt dem Kommissar einen zusätzlichen Schlag versetzen."

languages.text: « Tenez, vous pouvez reprendre cet animal désobéissant. Puisqu'il refuse de faire ce que je dis, soit il servira de viande pour l'arène, soit il vous aidera à éliminer le commissaire. »
languages.original_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

traits.locale_text: « Tenez, vous pouvez reprendre cet animal désobéissant. Puisqu'il refuse de faire ce que je dis, soit il servira de viande pour l'arène, soit il vous aidera à éliminer le commissaire. »

languages.text: “来，这个不听话的破玩意儿就交给你了。既然它不肯听从我的命令，那要么把它当成活畜丢到竞技场上，要么让它和你一起对付政委。”
languages.original_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

traits.locale_text: “来，这个不听话的破玩意儿就交给你了。既然它不肯听从我的命令，那要么把它当成活畜丢到竞技场上，要么让它和你一起对付政委。”

languages.text: «Toma, puedes quedarte esta cosa desobediente. Se niega a hacer lo que le digo, así que puede convertirse en carne para la arena o permitirte asestar otro golpe al Comisario».
languages.original_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

traits.locale_text: «Toma, puedes quedarte esta cosa desobediente. Se niega a hacer lo que le digo, así que puede convertirse en carne para la arena o permitirte asestar otro golpe al Comisario».

languages.text: 「ほら、この反抗的な奴をくれてやる。俺の言うことを聞かんからな。闘技場の餌になるか、それとも貴様がコミッサーに一矢報いるのに使うか、好きにしろ」
languages.original_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

traits.locale_text: 「ほら、この反抗的な奴をくれてやる。俺の言うことを聞かんからな。闘技場の餌になるか、それとも貴様がコミッサーに一矢報いるのに使うか、好きにしろ」

languages.text: "Al, bu itaatsiz şey senin olsun. Söylediklerimi yapmayı reddediyor. Ya arena için et görevi görecek ya da Komiser'e fazladan bir darbe indirmeni sağlayacak."
languages.original_text: "Here, you can have this disobedient thing. It refuses to do what I say, so it will either become meat for the arena or allow you to strike an extra blow against the Commissar."

traits.locale_text: "Al, bu itaatsiz şey senin olsun. Söylediklerimi yapmayı reddediyor. Ya arena için et görevi görecek ya da Komiser'e fazladan bir darbe indirmeni sağlayacak."
